entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -40.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 3:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -40.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -44.4°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
